betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oStone and nether essences can be used to create ores with Mythic properties.

One mineral makes one ore...

One ore makes multiple minerals, especially if you use an industrial grinder!

This process can be looped for exponential yield (granted that you have enough essence).

Works with Rupee, Arlemite, Realmite, Rosite, Limonite, Netherite, Bloodgem, Emberstone, Runium, Ascended Jade, Ascended Sapphire,, Ascended Amethyst.
